name: RTW Retailwinds
short_description: RTW Retailwinds, Inc. operates as a specialty women's omni-channel and digitally enabled retailer in the United States.
long_description: RTW Retailwinds, Inc. operates as a specialty women's omni-channel and digitally enabled retailer in the United States. It offers a merchandise assortment, including wear-to-work, casual apparel, and accessories comprising pants, dresses, jackets, knit tops, blouses, sweaters, denims, T-shirts, active wear, handbags, jewelry, and shoes under the New York & Company, NY&C, Soho New York & Company Jeans, Lerner, Fashion to Figure, and FTF brand names for women between the ages of 25 and 49. The company sells its merchandise through a network of its retail and outlet locations, as well as online at nyandcompany.com, nyandcompanycloset.com, fashiontofigure.com, and happyxnature.com. As of December 5, 2019, it operated 414 retail and outlet locations in 35 states. The company was formerly known as New York & Company, Inc. and changed its name to RTW Retailwinds, Inc. in November 2018. RTW Retailwinds, Inc. was founded in 1918 and is headquartered in New York, New York.
